INDX 0.01

INDX is a personal file store being developed at the University of Southampton, for the SOCIAM project.

Backbone.Model

extend

model.extend( [classProperties,] properties )
To create a Model class of your own, you extend Backbone.Model and /// provide instance properties, as well as optional classProperties to be /// attached directly to the constructor function.

Arguments:
  1. classProperties
  2. properties

Returns:

initialize

model.initialize( [options,] [attributes] )
When creating an instance of a model, you can pass in the initial values of the attributes, which will be set on the model. If you define an initialize function, it will be invoked when the model is created.

Arguments:
  1. options
  2. attributes

Returns:

get

model.get( attribute )
Get the current value of an attribute from the model. For example: note.get("title")

Arguments:
  1. attribute

Returns:

Returns:

When creating an instance of a model, you can pass in the initial values of the attributes, which will be set on the model. If you define an initialize function, it will be invoked when the model is created.

get_or_create_file

box.get_or_create_file( fid )
<string> fid file id /// Tries to get a file with given id. If it doesn't exist, a file with that name is created.

Arguments:
  1. fid

get_box

store.get_box( boxid )

Arguments:
  1. boxid

Returns:

create_box

store.create_box( boxid )

Arguments:
  1. boxid - ( number or string ) the id for the box

Returns:
Returns a promise. Asynchronous.
store.create_box(...).then ( <[object Object]> the box, )
fail
  • store.create_box(...).fail ( <[object Object]> response, )
    other error
  • store.create_box(...).fail ( <[object Object]> response, )
    box already exists
